definition: The term "lesbar" refers to the quality or characteristic of a text or written material that is easily understandable and readable. It is commonly used to describe the readability or legibility of a written piece, indicating that it is clear and comprehensible to the reader.

examples.english: The font size should be legible.

examples.german: Der Text ist nicht lesbar, weil er zu klein gedruckt ist.
examples.english: The text is not readable because it is printed too small.

examples.german: Die Anleitung ist gut lesbar und verständlich.
examples.english: The manual is easy to read and understand.

examples.german: Die Website hat eine lesbar gestaltete Benutzeroberfläche.
examples.english: The website has a user interface designed for readability.
